translation.firstTime: Is this your first time here?
translation.infoInInstagram: To see who doesn't follow you, click the <bold>{{buttonText}}</bold> button.
translation.infoNotInInstagram: Instagram needs to be open in the background for the extension to work.
translation.notConnected: Could not connect to Instagram. Please close the extension, refresh Instagram, and try again.
translation.noUnfollowersMessage: You don't have any friends who are not following you back.
translation.unfollowersMessage: There are <bold>{{count}}</bold> people not following you back.
